channel.title: Projects on Elizabeth Ayer
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Elizabeth Ayer

item.title: Product Leadership
item.description:
• Product Managing High-Quality Products - 2024 talk at Project to Product Summit on sustaining quality as a product matures

  • Enshittification as Overproduction Part 1 and Part 2 - 2024 blog posts exploring the disastrous effect of pushing unwanted features on the market

  • Closing the Loop: Product Management for Continuous Delivery - 2019 keynote at FlowConf on building a team culture of feedback loops, healthy goal-setting, and empowerment

  • Feed Success and Starve Failure: Continuous Product Management - 2019 talk at Industry on smoothing out strategy swings via smooth change and feedback loops

  • Uncle Sam’s Recipe: Agile Product Management - 2019 talk at Mile High Agile on techniques and challenges of product management in government

  • What Product Management Needs: the Gift of Continuous Delivery - 2018 talk at the London Continuous Delivery Meetup on closing feedback loops

  • Zen and the Art of Continuous Delivery - 2015 talk at Lean Agile Scotland on the parallels between Continuous Delivery and Mindfulness

Need another format? Just ask!

item.title: Team Topologies
item.description:
Coming April 14-15, 2025! Success Patterns for Fast Flow and Team Topologies with Christopher Marsh at Explore DDD in Denver, CO

Previous:

  • Success Patterns for Fast Flow and Team Topologies - 2024 workshop with Christopher Marsh at QCon SF

  • Strategic Sourcing and Team Topologies - 2024 talk at the Enterprise Technology Leadership Summit on Team Topologies and enterprise procurement

  • Product leaders’ guide to team topologies - 2023 article on Mind the Product introducing key concepts of org design and TT to product leaders

  • Too many cooks or not enough kitchens? - 2023 closing keynote at RustConf on the importance and curation of boundaries.

I am an Associate Principal with Conflux, the digital transformation consultancy. If you are interested in what Team Topologies can do for your org, please get in touch through Conflux.

item.title: Power, Ethics, Collaboration
item.description:
• The Red Line Reflection - 2024 self-facilitated reflection on values and organizational consequences

  • Flourishing with Feminism - 2024 workshop with Matt Wynne at the Conference on Pattern Languages of Programs, People, and Practices. Paper forthcoming

  • Beyond Transparency - 2024 talk at Agile Cambridge on building communication across boundaries, puncturing myths of transparency

  • Product Leaders’ Guide to Power - 2023 workshop for Product Tank on power dynamics and how to hoard less

  • Changing Minds - you can, but should you? - 2023 talk at Agile on the Beach on ethics and change management Recording

  • Agile Traps - Common practices that wreck teams - 2021 talk with Nikki Lee at Lesbians Who Tech on the power-dynamic pitfalls of agile practices

Need another format? Just ask!
